cons: May be boring - pre-5th Job Skills can be lackluster

baseStats: Excludes Hyper Skill Passives, Link Skills, and buffs with cooldowns
Crit Damage: (+20% with Enrage active)
Final Damage: +10% + (110% from Advanced Combo) + (25% to Stunned/Blinded/Frozen enemies) + (+25% with Enrage active)

buffInfo.active: (Toggle), , , , (Toggle)
buffInfo.summons: (120s cd)

details: Can be stacked up to 3 times, once for each unique Explorer Warrior to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Explorers' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach the quest 'Victoria Island or Bust' and choose the 'Warrior, powerful and defensive' option

Once you reach Lv. 30 as a Warrior, talk to Dances with Balrog to accept a quest called 'Way of the Fighter'. Completing the quest will make you a Fighter and you will be on the path to a Hero. Fighter is the 2nd job of Hero

build: -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path
4th Job skills require Mastery Books to reach Master Level 20 & 30

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Advanced Combo Attack - Reinforce and Boss Rush
  • Advanced Final Attack - Opportunity
  • Raging Blow - Reinforce and Extra Strike

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage 40
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Nimble Feet
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration 12, Movement Speed: 20

primary.name: Maple Return
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Southperry Harbor on Maple Island.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Slash Blast
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 6, Damage: 335%, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Slashes forward

primary.name: War Leap
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, allows you to jump a greater distance
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice

primary.name: Leap Attack
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, Damage: 90%, Number of Attacks: 2, Max Enemies Hit: 4
primary.desc: Dive downwards towards nearby platforms below
details: Can only be used while in the air
Can also be activated by pressing the Down Arrow Key and Attack Key together
For both, you can also press the Left or Right Arrow Key instead to dive towards the desired direction

primary.name: Iron Body
primary.shortDesc: DEF: +200, Max HP: +20%, Damage Taken: -10%

primary.name: Warrior Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Speed: 10, Jump: 10, Max Speed: 10, Max HP Per Level: 20, Knockback Resistance: +40%

primary.name: Brandish
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 16, Damage: 280%, Number of Attacks: 2, Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Slashes forward twice

primary.name: Combo Fury
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 14, Damage: 140%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 2. Draws in enemies that are hit. 80% chance of stunning enemies that are drawn in. Same chance for gaining Combo Count against bosses. If used while pressing the down arrow key, only 1 enemy will be attacked but moves behind the enemy after use.
details:
[Active 1]: Pulls enemies toward you with a chance to stun
  • Grants Combo Orbs for any stunned enemies
[Active 2]: If used while pressing the Down Arrow Key, you are pulled instead towards the furthest enemy within range but does not stun

primary.name: Combo Attack
primary.shortDesc: When activated, 40% chance of having the attack added to the Combo Count. Attack Power for each Combo Count: +2. Max Combo Count: 5
primary.desc: When activated, there is a chance to gain a Combo Orb (up to 5) when attacking
details: Grants bonus Attack for each Combo Orb
Right-clicking the icon in your Skill UI will toggle the visual effect on/off

primary.name: Weapon Booster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 21, Weapon's Attack Speed increased for 200 sec
primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)

primary.name: Rage
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Duration: 200 sec, Attack Power of Party Members Including Yourself: +30, Damage Taken: -30%, Damage Reflection: 500% of damage received.
primary.desc: Increases %Damage Reduction and grants flat attack
details: Additionally while active, when you take damage, you deal some back

primary.name: Weapon Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Sword and Axe Mastery: +50%, Final Damage: +10%\nDamage +5% when equipped with an Axe.

primary.name: Final Attack
primary.shortDesc: [Final Attack Skills] Has a 40% chance to deal Final Attack damage of 150%.
primary.desc: Grants your attacks a chance to deal an additional hit

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase STR by 30 and DEX by 30.

primary.name: Intrepid Slash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 19, Damage: 258%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Slashes forward several times

primary.name: Rush
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Damage: 305%, Max Enemies Pushed: 12
primary.desc: Dash forward while pushing enemies back

primary.name: Panic
primary.shortDesc: Cost: 20 MP and 2 combo orbs, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 1150%, Enemy's Attack Power: -30%. Chance to activate Shadow Attack and Blind: 100%, which decreases Enemy Accuracy by 20% for 80 sec. When used again within 10 sec, 1 additional combo orb will be consumed
primary.desc: Strikes forward with a chance to inflict a debuff
details:
[Debuff]: Reduces %Attack and %Accuracy (Blind debuff)
  • Duration is halved for bosses
Consumes 2 Combo Orbs, subsequent use within a short period of time increases amount of Combo Orbs consumed

primary.name: Shout
primary.shortDesc: Cost: 18 MP and 1 combo orb(s), Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 200%, Number of Attacks: 6\nCooldown: 10 sec
primary.desc: Creates a shockwave that damages nearby enemies
details: If used when holding Down Arrow Key, attack range is decreased but has a chance to stun enemies
Consumes 1 Combo Orb

primary.name: Upward Charge
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 300%.
primary.desc: Launch up into the air
details:
Can also be activated by pressing the Up Arrow Key and Attack Key together
  • Right-clicking the skill will lock it, preventing input activation

primary.name: Combo Synergy
primary.shortDesc: Has a 80% chance to gain a combo orb with every attack. Final Damage increases by 5% for each combo orb, total applied between combo orbs. Upon taking a hit, has a 30% chance to add a combo orb
primary.desc: Increases %Final Damage for each Combo Orb and increases chance to gain Combo Orbs
details: Additionally, when you are hit, you have a chance to create a Combo Orb

primary.name: Self Recovery
primary.shortDesc: Regularly recovers 1500 HP and 200 MP.

primary.name: Chance Attack
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage (to stunned, blinded, frozen, incapacitated enemies): +25%\nPermanently increases your Critical Rate by 20%.

primary.name: Endure
primary.shortDesc: Abnormal Status Resistance: +30, Elemental Resistance: +30%

primary.name: Raging Blow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 200%, Number of Attacks: 7, Final attack is critical\nIf Raging Blow is enhanced, Attack: 7 times, Damage: 215%, and the final two attacks are criticals.
primary.desc: Slashes forward furiously
details: The final blow is a guaranteed Critical Hit
When Enranged, attack deals increased %Damage and the last 2 final blows are guaranteed Critical Hits

primary.name: Puncture
primary.shortDesc: Cost: 36 MP and 1 combo orb(s). Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 576%, Number of Attacks: 4. Attacked enemies have a 100% to take 165% damage every 2 sec, for 30 sec. Critical Hits deal 25% more damage to afflicted enemies. When a party member attacks, this increases by 10%\nShout's damage increased by 160%
primary.desc: Strikes forward while applying a damaging debuff
details: [Debuff]: Enemy takes more %Crit Damage
[Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage of
Consumes 1 Combo Orb

primary.name: Magic Crash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, 100% chance to remove enemies' buffs. For 22 sec, prevents 10 enemies from casting buffs.\nCooldown: 60 sec
primary.desc: Removes buffs on nearby enemies and prevents them from casting new buffs

primary.name: Power Stance
primary.shortDesc: Knockback Resistance: +60%.

primary.name: Enrage
primary.shortDesc: Cost: 50 MP and 1 Combo Orb, Final Damage: +25%, Critical Damage: +20%\nReduces the Max Enemies Hit for all skills (except some summons) by 1/3. For skills that target multiple enemies, Max Enemies Hit won't be reduced below 2.
primary.desc: When toggled, you can only attack one enemy but you gain increased %Final Damage and %Crit Damage
details: Consumes 1 Combo Orb to enable

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 360 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

primary.name: Advanced Combo
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage boosted to 10% per Combo Orb, Max Combo Orbs: 10, Double Charge Speed Proc Rate: 80%, Weapon Mastery: Increased by 70%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Increases %Final Damage per Combo Orb
Increases max number of Combo Orbs
Grants chance to gain double Combo Orbs

primary.name: Combat Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Defense Ignored: 50%

primary.name: Advanced Final Attack
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +30 permanently.\n[Final Attack Skills] Final Attack Chance: 60%, Damage: 170%, Times Activated: 3.
details: Increases activation chance, %Damage, and number of hits
Now grants flat Attack

hyperPassive.name: Advanced Combo Attack - Reinforce
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Final Damage increased by 2% for each additional combo orb.

hyperPassive.name: Advanced Combo Attack - Opportunity
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Additional 20% chance to charge two combo orbs at once.

hyperPassive.name: Advanced Combo Attack - Boss Rush
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Damage increases by 2% when attacking Boss Monster for each combo.

hyperActive.name: Cry Valhalla
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Knockdown Immunity Duration: 30 sec, Attack Power: +50, Critical Rate: +30%, Status Resistance: +100, Elemental Resistance: +100%, Raging Blow Boost\nCooldown: 150 sec.
details: Raging Blow is enhanced when this buff is active

hyperActive.name: Rising Rage
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 8, Enemies Hit: 10\nCooldown: 10 sec
hyperActive.desc: Creates a massive explosion that damages nearby enemies

hyperActive.name: Epic Adventure
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Applies to any Explorer class in the party

fifthMain.name: Burning Soul Blade
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 350, Summon Duration: 72 sec. Press the skill key again to have the blade stay put (It will respawn if you stray too far). While near blade, Raging Blow is boosted.
When you use an offensive skill, attacks up to 8 enemies 6 times every 1 sec with 50% bonus Critical Rate.
Normal - Damage: 620% (While enraged: 700%)
Stationary - Damage: 565% (While enraged: 615%)
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summons a sword that attacks whenever you attack
details: Pressing the skill key again will make it stationary and attack nearby enemies
Raging Blow is enhanced when this skill is active

fifthMain.name: Worldreaver
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 500, Combo Orbs Used: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 800%, Number of Attacks: 14, Invulnerable while casting.\nOn hit, increases Final Damage for 5 sec by the Final Damage bonus of the Combo Orbs consumed for this skill.\nCooldown: 20 sec
fifthMain.desc: Slices nearby enemies in half dealing tremendous damage
details: Consumes 6 Combo Orbs
%Final Damage from Combo Orbs is increased briefly when used

fifthMain.name: Instinctual Combo
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Can be used if you have at least 1 Combo Orb. MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 30 sec
The Combo Orb increases Final Damage, damage to bosses, and Attack Power by 17%. Decreases the chance of charging Combo Orbs by 50%
Tear in Space: Periodically activates a rift 3 time(s). Damage: 400%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 6. Cannot charge the Combo Orb with the Tear in Space.
Cooldown: 240 sec
fifthMain.desc: Enhances Raging Blow to create a 'Tear in Space'
details: Increases Combo Orb bonuses of %Final Damage, %Boss Damage, and Attack
Decreases chance of obtaining Combo Orbs by 50%

fifthMain.name: Sword Illusion
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 700, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 250%, Attack Count: 4, Chase Cut Activation Count: 12. Afterwards, activates 5 explosion(s), which attack 5 time(s) for 500% damage.\nCooldown: 30
fifthMain.desc: Slashes furiously in front of you
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

meta: Hero is a STR warrior class part of the Explorers. This class is known for its strong bossing capabilities and strong 5th job skills but has a linear playstyle and poor mobility
